item.title: iPhone Air 贬值率破纪录，成苹果最不保值机型
item.guid: iPhone-Air-贬值率破纪录，成苹果最不保值机型
item.description:
According to MacRumors, the latest market analysis released by SellCell shows that Apple's iPhone Air has set a new low in resale value performance in the used market in recent years. 据 MacRumors 报道，SellCell 发布的最新市场分析显示，苹果 iPhone Air 在二手市场的保值表现创下近年新低。

Data shows that the model's average depreciation rate reached 44.3% ten weeks after its release, with the 1TB version showing the most significant drop, being listed as "the worst-performing model." 数据显示，该机型在发售十周后平均贬值率高达 44.3%，其中 1TB 版本跌幅最为明显，被列为「表现最糟糕的机型」。

In contrast, the iPhone 17 series had an average depreciation rate of 34.6% during the same period, outperforming last year's iPhone 16 series' 39%, while the iPhone 15 series depreciated by only 31.9% during the same period, showing the best resale value. 相比之下，iPhone 17 系列同期平均贬值率为 34.6%，优于去年 iPhone 16 系列的 39%，而 iPhone 15 系列同期仅贬值 31.9%，保值率最佳。

SellCell retrieved real-time trade-in quotes from over 40 recycling companies in the US and compared the average resale price of each model with the manufacturer's suggested retail price. SellCell 调取了美国 40 余家回收企业的实时以旧换新报价，并将各机型的平均转售价与厂商建议零售价进行对比。

The results show that the iPhone Air ranked at the bottom across all storage configurations, with a depreciation range of 40.3% to 47.7%. Among them, the 1TB version of the iPhone Air experienced the largest drop, becoming the worst-performing model in the overall data. 结果显示，iPhone Air 在所有存储配置中均处于榜单末位，贬值区间为 40.3% 至 47.7%。其中，1TB 版本的 iPhone Air 跌幅最大，成为整体数据中表现最差的机型。

In stark contrast are the Pro series models. The 256GB iPhone 17 Pro Max depreciated by only 26.1% after ten weeks, and the 512GB iPhone 17 Pro Max had a depreciation rate of 30.3%. All Pro and Pro Max models did not exceed 40%. The standard iPhone 17's depreciation rate ranged from 32.9% to 40.8%, largely on par with the previous generation. 与之形成鲜明对比的是 Pro 系列机型。256GB 版 iPhone 17 Pro Max 十周后仅贬值 26.1%，512GB 版 iPhone 17 Pro Max 贬值率为 30.3%，所有 Pro 及 Pro Max 机型均未超过 40%。标准版 iPhone 17 的贬值率区间为 32.9% 至 40.8%，与上一代基本持平。

Analysis indicates that the continuous downward trend of the iPhone Air may signal long-term uncertainty in the used market, while the strong performance of the Pro series highlights the stable demand for high-end models in the used market. 分析指出，iPhone Air 的持续下跌趋势可能预示其在二手市场存在长期不确定性，而 Pro 系列的坚挺表现则凸显了高端机型在二手市场的稳定需求。

Overall, the iPhone 17 series has a resale value approximately 9.7% higher than the iPhone Air, indicating a clear differentiation in market perception for models with different positioning. 整体来看，iPhone 17 系列在保值率上比 iPhone Air 高出约 9.7%，显示出市场对不同定位机型的明显分化。

item.title: 美光退出英睿达消费级业务，全面押注企业级与 HBM 内存
item.guid: 美光退出英睿达消费级业务，全面押注企业级与-HBM-内存
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Micron Technology announced on the 3rd local time that it will exit its consumer brand Crucial business and plans to completely cease sales of related product lines by the end of February 2026. 据界面新闻报道，美光科技于当地时间 3 日宣布将退出其消费级品牌英睿达（Crucial）业务，并计划在 2026 年 2 月底前全面停止相关产品线的销售。

This decision means that Micron will no longer offer Crucial memory and SSDs through retail, e-commerce, and distribution channels, but will instead focus resources on strategic areas such as enterprise-grade storage, server memory, and AI-related High Bandwidth Memory (HBM). 这一决定意味着美光将不再通过零售、电商和分销渠道提供英睿达内存与 SSD，而是将资源集中于企业级存储、服务器内存及 AI 相关的高带宽内存（HBM）等战略领域。

Micron stated that the surge in demand for AI-driven data centers has led to tight supply and demand for memory and storage. 美光方面表示，AI 驱动的数据中心需求激增，导致内存与存储的供需紧张。

Sumit Sadana, the company's Executive Vice President and Chief Business Officer, pointed out that in order to better support faster-growing strategic customers, Micron had to make the difficult decision to exit the consumer business. 公司执行副总裁兼首席商务官苏米特·萨达纳（Sumit Sadana）指出，为了更好地支持增长更快的战略客户，美光不得不做出退出消费级业务的艰难决定。

Crucial, as Micron's sole consumer brand, was founded in 1996. It was a pioneer in launching DDR memory and first introduced DDR4 technology in 2013. Its P1 series SSDs, released in 2018, further redefined consumer-grade performance standards. 英睿达作为美光旗下唯一的消费者品牌，成立于 1996 年，曾率先推出 DDR 内存并在 2013 年首发 DDR4 技术，2018 年推出的 P1 系列 SSD 更刷新了消费级性能标准。

With the explosion in demand for high-bandwidth, low-latency memory for AI model training and big data processing, the DRAM demand for a single AI server is now 8 times that of a regular server. 随着 AI 模型训练和大数据处理对高带宽、低延迟内存的需求爆发，单台 AI 服务器对 DRAM 的需求已是普通服务器的 8 倍。

HBM product revenue has become Micron's core profit source, with Q3 FY2025 revenue reaching $1.98 billion, annualized to nearly $8 billion. Micron estimates that the global HBM market size will grow from $4 billion in 2023 to $25 billion in 2025, with a compound annual growth rate exceeding 150%. HBM 产品收入已成为美光的核心利润来源，2025 财年三季度收入达 19.8 亿美元，年化接近 80 亿美元。美光测算，全球 HBM 市场规模将从 2023 年的 40 亿美元增长至 2025 年的 250 亿美元，年复合增速超过 150%。

Industry analysis suggests that Micron's exit from the consumer market may exacerbate short-term supply-demand tension, pushing memory prices to continue rising. However, the market share it cedes may be absorbed by domestic manufacturers and other international brands. 业内分析认为，美光退出消费级市场或将加剧短期供需紧张，推动内存条价格继续上涨。但其所让渡的市场份额可能会被国产厂商及其他国际品牌吸收。

Micron has pledged to continue providing warranty and technical support for sold Crucial products and to minimize the impact on employees through internal reassignments where possible. 美光承诺将继续为已售出的英睿达产品提供保修与技术支持，并通过内部调岗尽可能减少对员工的影响。

item.title: 苹果环境与政策负责人官宣退休，继任者来自 Meta
item.guid: 苹果环境与政策负责人官宣退休，继任者来自-Meta
item.description:
According to The Verge, Apple's senior management has undergone significant changes again. Following the departures of COO Jeff Williams, AI head John Giannandrea, and design chief Alan Dye, Apple announced that Lisa Jackson, head of environment and policy, will retire by the end of January 2026. 据 The Verge 报道，苹果公司高层人事再度出现重大调整。继 COO Jeff Williams、AI 负责人 John Giannandrea 以及设计主管 Alan Dye 相继离职后，苹果宣布环境与政策负责人 Lisa Jackson 将于 2026 年 1 月底退休。

Concurrently, Jennifer Newstead, the current Chief Legal Officer at Meta, will officially take over as Apple's General Counsel on March 1, 2026, replacing Kate Adams, who is scheduled to retire at the end of 2026. 同时，现任 Meta 首席法务官 Jennifer Newstead 将于 2026 年 3 月 1 日正式接任苹果总法律顾问一职，接替计划在 2026 年底退休的 Kate Adams。

Jackson joined Apple in 2013 and has served as head of environment and policy since 2015, having previously led the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency during the Obama administration. Her departure means that Apple's leadership in environmental and social affairs will be managed by current COO Sabih Khan. Jackson 自 2013 年加入苹果，2015 年起担任环境与政策主管，曾在奥巴马政府时期领导美国环保署。她的离任意味着苹果在环境与社会事务方面的领导层将交由现任 COO Sabih Khan 管理。

Meanwhile, Apple also announced the integration of its government affairs department into the General Counsel system, with Adams overseeing the transition, and Newstead taking over afterward. The new position will be named 'Senior Vice President, General Counsel, and Head of Government Affairs,' reflecting the merger and adjustment of the organizational structure. 与此同时，苹果还宣布将政府事务部门整合至总法律顾问体系，由 Adams 负责过渡，之后由 Newstead 接管。新职位将被命名为「高级副总裁、总法律顾问兼政府事务负责人」，体现组织架构的合并调整。

Adams has served as Apple's General Counsel since 2017, having worked at Honeywell for 14 years. With her retirement and Newstead's arrival, Apple's power structure in policy and legal affairs will undergo significant changes. This move is seen as a strategic adjustment by Apple in response to the global regulatory environment and corporate social responsibility. Adams 自 2017 年起担任苹果总法律顾问，曾在霍尼韦尔工作 14 年。随着她的退休与 Newstead 的加入，苹果在政策与法律事务上的权力结构将发生显著变化。此举被视为苹果在应对全球监管环境与企业社会责任方面的战略调整。

item.title: 豆包手机工程机被炒至近万元，行业评价两极分化
item.guid: 豆包手机工程机被炒至近万元，行业评价两极分化
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, the first batch of 'Doubao Phone Assistant' engineering machines quickly soared in price on the secondary market after selling out through official channels. On platforms like Xianyu, some unopened models were quoted at 7999 – 9999 yuan, more than double the official price of 3499 yuan. 据新浪财经报道，「豆包手机助手」首批工程机在官方渠道售罄后迅速在二级市场被炒高，闲鱼等平台上部分未拆封机型报价已达 7999 – 9999 元，相较官方 3499 元定价溢价超过一倍。

Meanwhile, yesterday, social media saw divided reviews for the 'Doubao Phone'. 与此同时，昨日社交媒体出现对于「豆包手机」的分化评价。

Meizu Technology publicly stated that it 'looks forward to opportunities for in-depth cooperation,' believing that the Doubao Phone expands the imagination for AI phones, and emphasized that Flyme AIOS 2 also aims for system-level automation. 魅族科技公开表示「期待有机会深入合作」，认为豆包手机拓展了 AI 手机的想象空间，并强调 Flyme AIOS 2 同样以系统级自动化为目标。

Luo Wei, Honor's Chief Imaging Engineer, frankly stated that it is extremely difficult for software companies to make phones, suggesting that if they persist, they might 'perish in three generations,' or otherwise 'die in one generation.' However, Fang Fei, a senior executive in Honor's product line, believes that Doubao Assistant's general-scenario automatic execution path aligns with Honor's direction and looks forward to ecosystem co-building. 荣耀首席影像工程师罗巍则直言软件公司做手机难度极大，若坚持可能「三世而亡」，否则「一代死」。但荣耀产品线高管方飞则认为豆包助手的通用场景自动执行路径与荣耀的方向一致，期待生态共建。

According to previous reports, some users experienced passive logouts or login anomalies when using the assistant to perform WeChat-related operations. WeChat responded by stating that sensitive operations should not be performed via the assistant on engineering machines for now, and related issues are being verified. ByteDance, on the other hand, emphasized that the permission list and white paper have been made public, and the execution process requires user authorization and can be interrupted. 而据此前报道，部分用户在使用助手执行微信相关操作时出现被动下线或登录异常，微信方面回复称暂勿在工程机上通过助手操作敏感环节，相关问题正在核实；字节跳动方面则强调，权限清单与白皮书已公开，执行过程需用户授权且可中断。

In response, Luo Yonghao posted on Weibo, stating that technological revolutions are unstoppable, and AI assistants are bound to flourish everywhere. 对此，罗永浩在微博发文称，技术革命是谁都拦不住的，AI 助手一定会遍地开花。

"Doubao Phone" is an engineering machine jointly launched by ByteDance and ZTE, customized based on the nubia M153 model. It serves as the carrier for the AIOS technical preview, primarily targeting developers and early adopters. 「豆包手机」是字节跳动联合中兴通讯，基于 nubia M153 机型定制推出的工程机，作为 AIOS 技术预览版的载体，主要面向开发者和尝鲜用户。

Its core function is the built-in "Doubao Phone Assistant," which uses system-level permissions to achieve cross-application, multi-step automated operations, such as simulating clicks to complete complex tasks. 其核心功能是内置的「豆包手机助手」，通过系统级权限实现跨应用、多步骤的自动化操作，例如模拟点击完成复杂任务。

item.title: 苹果公布年度 App 与游戏，AI 学习 App 和《无畏契约》手游获奖
item.guid: 苹果公布年度-App-与游戏，AI-学习-App-和《无畏契约》手游获奖
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple announced the winners of the 2025 App Store Awards, with the App of the Year and Game of the Year officially revealed. 昨天，苹果公布了 2025 年 App Store Awards 获奖名单，年度 App 与年度游戏正式揭晓。

    The App of the Year award went to "CapWords," developed by a small team.

This app uses AI technology to recognize words from photos, supporting instant translation in 10 languages. Users simply photograph an item, and the app generates stickers and flashcards with foreign language names, offering an intuitive learning method. 这款应用通过 AI 技术实现拍照识词，支持 10 种语言即时翻译。用户只需拍摄物品，App 即可生成带有外语名称的贴纸和单词卡，提供直观的学习方式。

In addition to recognizing nouns, the new version of "CapWords" has expanded to include verbs and adjectives, and supports Live Photos and video recognition. Users can save stickers and create physical cards, further enhancing the learning experience. 除了识别名词，《CapWords》新版本已扩展至动词和形容词，并支持实况照片与视频识别。用户可保存贴纸并制作实体卡片，进一步增强学习体验。

Founder Ace designed the app due to his daughter Dorothy's learning needs. The team consists of only 3 people: product designer Ace, engineer Mengdi, and operations specialist Dora. 创始人 Ace 因女儿 Dorothy 的学习需求而设计该应用。团队仅有 3 人，包括产品设计师 Ace、工程师 Mengdi 以及运营 Dora。

    "Valorant Mobile: Origin Action" won the Game of the Year award.

This mobile title, jointly developed by Riot Games and Tencent's Lightspeed Studios, continues the success of "Valorant" on PC, attracting global players with its fast-paced first-person team competitive gameplay. 这款由拳头游戏与腾讯光子工作室联合打造的移动端作品，延续了《无畏契约》在 PC 平台的成功，以快节奏的第一人称团队竞技玩法吸引全球玩家。

The game offers Bomb Defusal and Brawl modes, supporting aim assist and gyroscope controls to help players quickly get started. Map designs incorporate diverse cultural elements, with new maps like "Jiuli Ancient Village" featuring traditional Chinese styles. Industry Significance 游戏提供爆破模式与乱斗玩法，支持辅助瞄准与陀螺仪操作，帮助玩家快速上手。地图设计融入多元文化元素，其中「九黎古寨」等新地图加入了国风元素。行业意义

The App Store Awards have always been considered an important indicator of app and game innovation. This year's winning works highlight the potential of AI technology in educational scenarios and the continued popularity of mobile competitive games. App Store Awards 一直被视为衡量应用与游戏创新力的重要指标。今年的获奖作品凸显了 AI 技术在教育场景的应用潜力，以及移动端竞技游戏的持续热度。

Apps of the Year by Device Category 各设备类别的年度应用

    iPhone: Tiimo (tiimo)

    iPad: Detail (Detail Technologies B.V.)

    Mac: Essayist (Essayist Software Inc.)

    Apple Vision Pro: Explore POV (James Hustler)

    Apple Watch: Strava (Strava, Inc.)

    Apple TV: HBO Max (WarnerMedia Global Digital Services, LLC.)

Game of the Year 年度游戏

    iPhone: Pokémon TCG Pocket (The Pokemon Company)

    iPad: DREDGE (Black Salt Games)

    Mac: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition (CD PROJEKT S.A.)

    Apple Vision Pro: Porta Nubi (Michael Temper)

    Apple Arcade: WHAT THE CLASH? (Triband ApS)

item.title: 北京荟聚 Apple Store 后天开幕
item.guid: 北京荟聚-Apple-Store-后天开幕
item.description:
Beijing's sixth Apple Store — "Apple Beijing Huiju Retail Store" will officially open on December 6th at 10 AM. This is Apple's sixth retail store in the Chinese capital and its 59th store in Greater China. 北京第六家 Apple Store ——「Apple 北京荟聚零售店」将于 12 月 6 日上午 10 点正式开幕。这是苹果在中国首都的第六家零售店，也是大中华区第 59 家门店。

The new store is located on the first floor of Beijing Huiju Shopping Center, No. 15 Xinning Street, Daxing District, Beijing, situated in the core residential area of the southern city. 新店位于北京市大兴区欣宁街 15 号北京荟聚购物中心一层，地处南城核心居住区。

Previously, Apple retail stores in Beijing were mainly concentrated in the northern city, such as Sanlitun, Xidan, and Wangfujing, meaning users in the southern city often had to travel across districts to access direct store services. This opening is seen as an important addition to Apple's retail layout in Beijing. 此前，北京的苹果零售店主要集中在北城，如三里屯、西单、王府井等地，南城用户往往需要跨区才能享受直营店服务。此次开业被视为苹果在北京零售布局的一次重要补充。

Apple officially stated that the Beijing Huiju Retail Store has approximately 100 team members who will provide customers with "Apple's world-renowned personalized care and support." 苹果官方表示，北京荟聚零售店拥有约 100 名团队成员，将为顾客提供「苹果享誉世界的个性化关照与支持」。

Customers can purchase the latest generation iPhone 17 series, iPhone Air, as well as the 14-inch MacBook Pro and iPad Pro with M5 chips. Additionally, the store features a dedicated Apple Vision Pro experience area where users can book a 30-minute immersive demo to experience spatial computing application scenarios. 顾客可在店内购买最新一代 iPhone 17 系列、iPhone Air，以及搭载 M5 芯片的 14 英寸 MacBook Pro 和 iPad Pro。同时，店内设有 Apple Vision Pro 专属体验区，用户可预约 30 分钟沉浸式演示，感受空间计算的应用场景。

In terms of design, the Apple Beijing Huiju Retail Store continues Apple's environmental and accessibility concepts, using sustainable materials and wooden frames. Some building materials are sourced locally in China, and it achieves 100% use of renewable energy and carbon neutrality. 在设计方面，北京荟聚零售店延续了苹果的环保与无障碍理念，采用可持续材料与木质框架，建筑材料部分取材自中国本土，并实现 100% 使用可再生能源与碳中和。

The store is equipped with a Genius Bar, Apple Pickup area, flexible seating heights, and accessible pathways, ensuring inclusivity and convenience. 店内配备 Genius Bar 天才吧、Apple Pickup 自提区，以及灵活的座椅高度与无障碍通道，确保包容性与便利性。

Additionally, the retail store will host free "Today at Apple" sessions daily, covering topics such as photography, art design, music, programming, and accessibility features. Users can participate through group reservations, further enhancing community interaction and learning experiences. 此外，零售店将每日举办免费「Today at Apple」课程，涵盖摄影、艺术设计、音乐、编程及辅助功能等主题，用户可通过团体预约参与，进一步提升社区互动与学习体验。

Since the opening of the first Apple Store in Sanlitun in 2008, Beijing's five stores have cumulatively welcomed over 150 million visitors. The opening of this new store in the southern city further expands coverage, providing an authentic service experience to more users. 自 2008 年三里屯首家 Apple Store 开业以来，北京五家门店累计已接待超过 1.5 亿名访客。此次南城新店的落地进一步扩大覆盖范围，为更多用户提供原汁原味的服务体验。

item.title: iPhone 17 系列热销，全球份额创 24.2% 新高
item.guid: iPhone-17-系列热销，全球份额创-24.2%-新高
item.description:
Research firm Counterpoint Research released a report yesterday showing that Apple's smartphone market performance was strong in October 2025 and during China's Double 11 period, driving both overall sales and global market share to new highs. 调研机构 Counterpoint Research 昨天发布研报显示，苹果在 2025 年 10 月及中国双 11 期间的智能手机市场表现强劲，推动整体销量与全球份额双双创下新高。

In the Chinese market, smartphone sales grew by 3% year-on-year during the Double 11 period, primarily driven by demand for the iPhone 17 series. 在中国市场，双 11 期间智能手机销量同比增长 3%，主要受 iPhone 17 系列需求拉动。

Among them, the iPhone 17 base model saw sales more than double year-on-year due to upgrades in storage capacity, optical system, and sensors, while maintaining the same price as the previous generation. 其中，iPhone 17 基础版因在存储容量、光学系统和传感器方面升级，但售价与上一代持平，销量同比增长超过一倍。

Pro and Pro Max models also recorded mid-to-high double-digit growth and enjoyed a 300 RMB discount during the Double 11 period. Excluding Apple, overall sales in the Chinese market declined by 5% year-on-year. Pro 与 Pro Max 机型也录得中高双位数增长，并在双 11 期间享受 300 元人民币优惠。若不计入苹果，中国市场整体销量同比下降 5%。

Huawei became the brand with the largest decline due to the Mate 80 series missing its sales period; Xiaomi's Double 11 sales decreased by 11% year-on-year due to the early release of its 17 series. 华为因 Mate 80 系列错过销售期，成为跌幅最大的品牌；小米则因 17 系列提前发布，导致双 11 销量同比下降 11%。

In the global market, Apple's smartphone shipment share in October increased by 12% year-on-year, reaching 24.2%, setting a new historical monthly high. 在全球市场，苹果 10 月智能手机出货量份额同比增长 12%，达到 24.2%，创下历史单月最高纪录。

Sales of the iPhone 17 series in its first six weeks on the market have surpassed the iPhone 16's performance during the same period, with the US, China, and Japan markets recording year-on-year growth of 11%, 47%, and 8% respectively, making China the fastest-growing market. The base model iPhone 17, with its cost-effectiveness and features close to Pro models, has become the main driver of growth. iPhone 17 系列上市六周销量已超越 iPhone 16 同期表现，美国、中国、日本市场分别录得 11%、47%、8% 的同比增长，其中中国成为增速最快的市场。基础款 iPhone 17 凭借性价比与接近 Pro 机型的功能，成为增长主力。

Meanwhile, the continued sales of iPhone 16e and older models, along with expansion into emerging markets, also contributed to the overall shipment growth. Upgrades in the Pro series' heat dissipation, imaging, and performance further solidified demand in the high-end market, while iPhone Air performed relatively weakly due to shortages in China. 与此同时，iPhone 16e 与旧款机型延续销售，以及新兴市场扩张，也为整体出货量贡献增量。Pro 系列在散热、影像与性能方面的升级进一步巩固了高端市场需求，而 iPhone Air 因中国缺货表现相对疲弱。

item.title: 小米汽车定制服务三城巡展启动，首站上海定档今天
item.guid: 小米汽车定制服务三城巡展启动，首站上海定档今天
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi Auto announced that its 'Xiaomi Customization Service' will begin a roadshow in three cities: Shanghai, Hangzhou, and Chengdu. The first stop will be exhibited today at the Xiaomi Home MixC Experience Store in Shanghai. According to official information, users who have placed a large deposit for customized products can enjoy exclusive VIP reception from a customization consultant and can finalize their order on-site. 昨天，小米汽车宣布其「小米定制服务」将在上海、杭州、成都三城开启巡展。首站将于今天在上海小米之家万象城体验店展出。根据官方信息，已下单定制产品的大定用户可享定制顾问专属 VIP 接待，并可现场锁单。

The customization service was officially launched on September 25th during Lei Jun's annual speech event, with a deposit of 80,000 yuan and a 90-day cooling-off period. 该定制服务于 9 月 25 日在雷军年度演讲活动中正式推出，定金为 80000 元，设有 90 天犹豫期。

The initial trial operation period is one year, during which users can start customizing from models such as YU7 Max and SU7 Ultra, with a limit of one purchase per person. Service content includes multiple personalized options such as exterior colors, calipers, and car logos. 首期试运营周期为一年，用户可从 YU7 Max 与 SU7 Ultra 等车型开始定制，每人限购一台。服务内容包括外观配色、卡钳、车标等多项个性化选择。

item.title: 澳大利亚宣布禁止 16 岁以下使用社交媒体
item.guid: 澳大利亚宣布禁止-16-岁以下使用社交媒体
item.description:
According to BBC reports, the Australian government announced that starting December 10th, minors under 16 will be prohibited from using major social media platforms, including TikTok, X, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat, and Threads. 据 BBC 报道，澳大利亚政府宣布自 12 月 10 日起，禁止 16 岁以下未成年人使用主要社交媒体平台，包括 TikTok、X、Facebook、Instagram、YouTube、Snapchat 和 Threads 等。

Existing accounts must be closed, and minors will also be unable to register new accounts. This measure is considered a global first, aiming to reduce the negative impact of social media on adolescent health and psychology. 现有账户需被关闭，未成年人也无法注册新账号。这一举措被视为全球首例，旨在减少社交媒体对青少年健康与心理的负面影响。

Government-commissioned research shows that 96% of 10-15 year olds have used social media, with 70% exposed to harmful content such as violence, misogynistic messages, and content encouraging eating disorders or suicide. Over half of respondents reported experiencing cyberbullying, and about one-seventh reported encountering grooming behavior. 政府委托的研究显示，96% 的 10-15 岁儿童曾使用社交媒体，其中 70% 接触过有害内容，如暴力、厌女信息及鼓励饮食失调或自杀的内容。超过一半的受访者表示曾遭遇网络霸凌，约七分之一报告遭遇诱骗行为。

Social media's design features encourage young people to spend more time in front of screens, while also pushing content that could be harmful to health.

The ban covers 10 platforms. Social media companies that violate the ban or fail to take reasonable measures to prevent minors from using them will face fines of up to 49.5 million Australian dollars. Enforcement methods include multiple age verification technologies such as ID verification, facial or voice recognition, and behavioral analysis. 该禁令覆盖 10 个平台，社交媒体公司若违规或未采取合理措施阻止未成年人使用，将面临最高 4950 万澳元罚款。执行方式包括身份证验证、人脸或语音识别，以及行为分析等多重年龄验证技术。

Industry insiders point out that despite the unprecedented strength of the measures, enforcement challenges may still arise, such as teenagers bypassing restrictions through special means. Critics also worry about privacy risks associated with large-scale data collection. 业内人士指出，尽管措施力度空前，但仍可能面临执行难题，例如青少年通过特殊手段绕过限制。批评者也担心大规模数据收集带来的隐私风险。

item.title: Google 搜索加码 AI 功能，开始测试「无缝切入」对话式 AI
item.guid: Google-搜索加码-AI-功能，开始测试「无缝切入」对话式-AI
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, Google is testing a significant update globally that integrates AI overviews with AI mode in search, aiming to allow users to 'seamlessly transition' into conversational AI mode directly from the search results page. 据 TechCrunch 报道，Google 正在全球范围内测试一项重要更新，将搜索中的 AI 概览与 AI 模式进行整合，旨在让用户在搜索结果页面即可「无缝切入」对话式 AI 模式。

This test is first open to mobile users. After seeing an AI overview in the search results, users can directly enter AI mode via the new 'Ask AI' button to continue multi-turn conversations, without needing to enter a separate AI secondary interface. 此次测试首先面向移动端用户开放。用户在搜索结果中看到 AI 概览后，可通过新增的「询问 AI」按钮直接进入 AI 模式，继续进行多轮对话，无需单独进入 AI 二级界面。

Robby Stein, Google's VP of Search Products, stated that users should be able to 'ask any question directly' without having to consider the method or entry point of asking. Google 搜索产品副总裁 Robby Stein 表示，用户应当能够「直接提出任何问题」，而不必考虑提问方式或入口。

Industry analysis indicates that as ads are gradually embedded into AI mode, Google is expected to maintain its ad revenue while encouraging users to rely more on AI-driven search experiences. 业内分析指出，随着广告逐步嵌入 AI 模式，Google 有望在保持广告收入的同时，推动用户更多依赖 AI 驱动的搜索体验。

However, publishers and website operators are concerned about further traffic decline, as existing research shows a significant drop in traditional click-through rates when AI overviews appear. 不过，出版商和网站运营者担忧流量进一步下滑，已有研究显示，AI 概览出现时，传统点击率显著下降。

On the other hand, the latest user research shows that AI mode can still drive traffic to websites for transactional searches. 另一方面，最新用户研究显示，在涉及交易型搜索时，AI 模式仍能为网站带来流量。

A survey by Search Engine Land shows that approximately 69% of users ultimately clicked on a website when using AI mode for service-related searches, indicating that high-value traffic is not entirely cut off by AI. Search Engine Land 的一份调查显示，约 69% 的用户在使用 AI 模式进行服务类搜索时最终点击了网站，表明高价值流量并未完全被 AI 截断。

This means that when optimizing search strategies, businesses need to shift from 'competing for the top spot' to ensuring entry into the 'candidate set' for AI mode, and rely on reviews and word-of-mouth to win clicks. 这意味着企业在优化搜索策略时，需从「争夺第一名」转向确保进入 AI 模式的「候选集合」，并依靠评论与口碑赢得点击。

This test is also seen as Google's response to competitive pressure from OpenAI. With the continuous iteration of the Gemini model, Google hopes to enhance user stickiness through integrated features and expand the popularity of AI search globally. 此次测试也被视为 Google 对 OpenAI 竞争压力的回应。随着 Gemini 模型的持续迭代，Google 希望通过整合功能提升用户粘性，并在全球范围内扩大 AI 搜索的普及度。

item.title: 雷蛇澄清外设封号传闻：《无畏契约》封禁源于第三方软件
item.guid: 雷蛇澄清外设封号传闻：《无畏契约》封禁源于第三方软件
item.description:
Recently, discussions about 'using Razer peripherals potentially leading to Valorant account bans' have sparked widespread concern among players. Razer officially released a statement yesterday via Weibo and multiple media outlets to clarify the situation. 近日关于「使用雷蛇外设产品可能导致《无畏契约》账号封禁」的讨论在玩家群体中引发广泛关注。雷蛇官方昨天通过微博及多家媒体发布声明，澄清相关情况。

Razer stated that after joint verification with the Valorant project team and Tencent Games' security technology team, the game will not result in a ban due to the normal use of Razer peripheral products and official drivers (such as Razer Synapse 4). 雷蛇表示，经与《无畏契约》项目组及腾讯游戏安全技术团队联合核查，游戏不会因正常使用雷蛇外设产品及官方驱动（如雷云 4）而导致封禁。

Banning actions primarily target players who use unauthorized third-party software or tamper with programs. Razer advises users to verify the reason for a ban through official channels and avoid installing or using unofficial software. 封禁行为主要针对使用未经官方授权的第三方软件或篡改程序的玩家。雷蛇建议用户通过官方渠道核查封禁原因，并避免安装或使用非官方授权软件。

According to the previously announced penalty notice for Valorant, a total of 21,718 accounts were banned between November 10th and November 23rd, including 3,992 cases of DMA cheats, 5,203 cases of AI and macro-like cheats, and 11,316 cheating machines were suspended. 根据《无畏契约》此前公布的处罚公告，在 11 月 10 日至 11 月 23 日期间，共有 21718 个账号被封禁，其中 DMA 外挂 3992 例，AI 与按键精灵类外挂 5203 例，并封停作弊机器 11316 台。

Razer emphasized that its devices and official drivers will not trigger the banning mechanism, and reiterated its commitment to continue cooperating with game developers to maintain a fair competitive environment. 雷蛇强调，其设备及官方驱动不会触发封禁机制，并重申将持续与游戏开发商合作，维护公平竞技环境。

This incident sparked extensive discussion on social media, with many players concerned that normal use of peripherals might lead to false accusations. Razer explicitly stated that it reserves the right to pursue legal action against any acts of fabricating and spreading false information, or maliciously slandering the brand and product reputation. 此次事件在社交平台引发大量讨论，不少玩家担心正常使用外设可能被误判。雷蛇方面则明确指出，任何捏造并散布不实信息、恶意诋毁品牌及产品声誉的行为，将保留依法追究法律责任的权利。

item.title: 千问把 Office 「装」进对话框，整合文档排版与格式转换
item.guid: 千问把-Office-「装」进对话框，整合文档排版与格式转换
item.description:
Recently, Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen launched new capabilities for office and writing scenarios, further strengthening its one-stop office services. 近日，阿里千问近日上线面向办公与写作场景的全新能力，进一步强化其一站式办公服务。

This update integrates features such as document generation, intelligent typesetting, online editing, and multi-format conversion, and adds free PPT generation capability. Users no longer need to open traditional Office software; they can complete the entire process from content generation to task delivery simply through dialogue. 此次更新整合了文档生成、智能排版、在线编辑、多格式转换等功能，并新增免费 PPT 生成能力，用户无需再打开传统 Office 软件，仅通过对话即可完成从内容生成到任务交付的全过程。

Tongyi Qianwen's document function supports automatic generation of well-structured and professionally typeset Word documents, covering official formats from nearly a thousand universities, over 120 official document templates, and nearly 10,000 contract templates across 71 categories, ensuring that users receive documents that can be used directly without secondary formatting. 阿里千问的文档功能支持自动生成结构合理、排版专业的 Word 文档，覆盖近千所高校官方格式、120+ 公文模板及 71 类近万份合同模板，确保用户获取的文档无需二次排版即可直接使用。

At the same time, the intelligent editor allows users to delete, modify, refine, expand, or adjust the style of text, further enhancing document operability. 同时，智能编辑器允许用户对文字进行删改、润色、扩写或风格调整，进一步提升文档的可操作性。

For PPTs, Qianwen can accurately extract information based on various input content such as images, documents, and voice, and automatically match business-style templates. 在 PPT 方面，千问可基于图片、文档、语音等多种输入内容精准提炼信息，并自动匹配商务风格模版。

Users can first confirm the generated outline, then generate a complete PPT with one click, and support template replacement and content adjustment. After completion, users can choose to export as PPT, PDF, or long image format to meet different scenario needs. 用户可先确认生成的大纲，再一键生成完整 PPT，并支持模版更换与内容调整。完成后，用户可选择导出为 PPT、PDF 或长图格式，满足不同场景需求。

In addition, Qianwen also supports mutual conversion of various formats such as Word, PPT, PDF, and Excel, ensuring that users complete all operations within the same application, avoiding a fragmented experience across different software. 此外，千问还支持 Word、PPT、PDF、Excel 等多种格式的互转，确保用户在同一应用内完成所有操作，避免跨软件处理的割裂体验。

Alibaba stated that this upgrade aims to evolve the AI assistant from "generating content" to "completing tasks," delivering complete documents and presentation results to users. 阿里方面表示，此次升级旨在让 AI 助手从「生成内容」进化为「完成任务」，为用户交付完整的文档与演示成果。

Shuyao, Product Manager of Tongyi Qianwen, pointed out: "We hope Qianwen can not only inspire users to generate ideas but also deliver complete documents to them." 阿里千问产品经理书瑶指出：「我们希望千问不仅能激发用户产生想法，更能为用户交付完整文档。」

item.title: 顾客 AI 伪造螃蟹损坏骗退款被拘 8 日，商家呼吁加强监管
item.guid: 顾客-AI-伪造螃蟹损坏骗退款被拘-8-日，商家呼吁加强监管
item.description:
According to multiple media reports, a recent incident involving a hairy crab vendor in Jiangsu's Yangcheng Lake, where a customer used AI technology to forge images of dead crabs to fraudulently obtain a refund, has seen developments. The police confirmed that the customer involved engaged in fraudulent compensation behavior and was legally sentenced to 8 days of administrative detention, with the illegal gain of 195 yuan recovered. 据多家媒体报道，近日，江苏澄阳湖一位大闸蟹商家遭遇顾客利用 AI 技术伪造蟹类死亡图像骗取退款的事件迎来进展。警方确认涉事顾客存在骗赔行为，并依法处以行政拘留 8 日，同时追回违法所得 195 元。

The incident occurred on November 18th when a customer from Guangdong, after purchasing 8 hairy crabs online, claimed that 6 of them were dead and submitted pictures and videos as evidence. Although the vendor was suspicious, they chose to issue a refund to avoid disputes. 事件发生在 11 月 18 日，一名广东顾客在网购 8 只大闸蟹后，声称其中 6 只死亡，并提交图片与视频作为证据。商家虽有怀疑，但为避免纠纷，选择退款。

However, subsequent verification revealed inconsistencies in the number of male and female dead crabs in the two videos provided by the customer, suspected to be forged using AI technology. The vendor then reported the case to the police. 然而，后续核查发现顾客提供的两段视频中死蟹的公母数量不一致，疑似通过 AI 技术合成伪造。商家遂报警处理。

After investigation, the police determined that the act constituted fraudulent compensation and issued an administrative penalty decision. The customer involved was administratively detained for eight days, and the full refund amount was recovered. The vendor stated that although rights protection was time-consuming and laborious, they hoped this action would remind peers that "one should not remain silent in the face of AI fraud." 警方调查后认定该行为属于骗赔，并发布行政处罚决定书。涉事顾客被行政拘留八日，退款金额全额追缴。 商家表示，尽管维权耗时耗力，但希望通过此举提醒同行「面对 AI 造假不该沉默」。

Meanwhile, similar cases frequently appear on e-commerce platforms. For example, some sellers claim that customers use AI technology to forge images of damaged luggage to apply for returns and refunds, and even cases of swapping items for return have occurred. 与此同时，类似案例在电商平台频繁出现。例如有卖家称，顾客利用 AI 技术伪造行李箱破损图像申请退货退款，甚至出现掉包退货的情况。

Some sellers chose to report directly to the police after failed appeals, and the police have intervened and opened a case for fraud. 部分卖家在申诉失败后选择直接报警，警方已介入并以诈骗立案处理。

item.title: Nothing 启动 500 万美元社区投资轮，聚焦 AI 原生平台
item.guid: Nothing-启动-500-万美元社区投资轮，聚焦-AI-原生平台
item.description:
Yesterday, Nothing announced it would open a $5 million community investment round at a Series C valuation of $1.3 billion, aimed at building an AI-native operating system based on its existing hardware foundation. 昨天，Nothing 宣布将以 13 亿美元的 C 轮估值开启 500 万美元社区投资，用于打造基于现有硬件基础的 AI 原生操作系统。

This funding round will offer early bird participation via Wefunder (US) and Crowdcube on December 10th, with full public access opening on December 11th. The company emphasized that this round's shares would be priced the same as the Series C, offering community members an opportunity to grow with the company. 这一轮融资将于 12 月 10 日通过 Wefunder（美国）和 Crowdcube 提供早鸟参与，并于 12 月 11 日全面开放。公司强调，本轮融资仍以与 C 轮相同的每股价格进行，为社区成员提供与公司共同成长的机会。

Carl Pei, Founder and CEO of Nothing, stated that the company is moving towards its goal of being IPO-ready within three years, with the exact timing depending on market conditions and business development. Nothing 创始人兼 CEO 裴宇表示，公司正朝着三年内具备 IPO 条件的目标推进，具体时间将取决于市场环境与业务发展。

We are building the systems, governance structures, and financial discipline required for a public company, which forces us to think with a longer-term perspective and make smarter decisions, prioritizing sustainable growth. 我们正在建立一家上市公司所需的系统、治理结构和财务纪律，这迫使我们以更长期的视角思考，并做出更明智的决策，优先关注可持续增长。

Meanwhile, Nothing announced that Charlie Smith, former Chief Marketing and Communications Officer at Loewe, will join the company in January 2026 as Chief Brand Officer (CBO), reporting directly to CEO Carl Pei. 与此同时，Nothing 宣布前罗意威（Loewe）首席营销与传播官 Charlie Smith 将于 2026 年 1 月加入公司，担任首席品牌官（CBO），直接向 CEO 裴宇汇报。

Smith will be responsible for global brand strategy, including brand identity, marketing, communications, and retail space design. Smith 将负责全球品牌战略，包括品牌形象、市场营销、传播及零售空间设计。

Under Smith's leadership, Loewe was repeatedly named Lyst's "Hottest Brand in the World" and spearheaded collaborations with Studio Ghibli, On Running, and Japanese ceramic studio Suna Fujita. In 2025, Smith was included in Forbes' lists of "World's Most Entrepreneurial CMOs" and "World's Most Influential CMOs." 在 Smith 的领导下，Loewe 曾多次获评 Lyst「全球最热门品牌」，并主导了与吉卜力工作室、昂跑及日本陶瓷工作室 Suna Fujita 的合作。2025 年，Smith 入选《福布斯》「全球最具企业家精神 CMO」与「全球最具影响力 CMO」榜单。

item.title: 💡 AT&T CEO：年轻人应以每 4 至 5 年为一个「章节」规划职业生涯
item.guid: 💡-AT&T-CEO：年轻人应以每-4-至-5-年为一个「章节」规划职业生涯
item.description:
According to Business Insider, AT&T CEO John Stankey stated on the podcast "In Good Company" that young people should view their careers as "chapters" with 4 to 5-year cycles, actively updating their skills in each phase to adapt to the rapidly changing technological and business environment. 据《商业内幕》报道，AT&T CEO John Stankey 在播客节目「In Good Company」中表示，年轻人应将职业生涯视为以 4 至 5 年为周期的「章节」，并在每个阶段主动更新技能，以应对快速变化的科技与商业环境。

Stankey pointed out that the relevance of traditional university education is "rapidly fading," and young people must become the "deans" of their own learning, continuously accumulating new knowledge through self-driven methods. Stankey 指出，传统大学教育的相关性正在「快速消退」，年轻人必须成为自己学习的「院长」，通过自我驱动的方式不断积累新知识。

He emphasized that information access is already extremely convenient, and artificial intelligence has further raised the bar for learning; those who can skillfully master AI and information resources will have an advantage in long-term competition. 他强调，信息获取已极为便捷，人工智能进一步提升了学习门槛，能够熟练掌握 AI 与信息资源的人将在长期竞争中占据优势。

As an executive who has worked at AT&T for over 41 years, Stankey emphasized that a career could last 80 to 90 years, and only by periodically reshaping one's skill base can competitiveness be maintained. 作为在 AT&T 工作超过 41 年的高管，Stankey 强调职业生涯可能长达 80 至 90 年，唯有通过周期性重塑技能基础，才能保持竞争力。

His views echo those of several tech leaders. LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman once proposed "becoming the CEO of your own career" and pointed out that young people are the "AI-native generation" who should leverage AI skills as a job-seeking advantage. 他的观点与多位科技领袖的看法相呼应。LinkedIn 联合创始人 Reid Hoffman 曾提出「成为自己职业的 CEO」，并指出年轻人是「AI 原生一代」，应将 AI 技能作为求职优势。

Tech investor Naval Ravikant believes that the internet has made self-driven learning possible, and traditional education models are "completely outdated," more akin to daycare. 科技投资人 Naval Ravikant 则认为，互联网已让自我驱动学习成为可能，传统教育模式「完全过时」，更像是托儿所。

item.title: 6799 元起，全球首款 8K 全景无人机影翎 Antigravity A1 正式发布
item.guid: 6799-元起，全球首款-8K-全景无人机影翎-Antigravity-A1-正式发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Insta360 and its partner-incubated drone brand "Antigravity" officially launched the world's first 8K panoramic drone, the Antigravity A1. 昨天，影石 Insta360 与合作方孵化的无人机品牌「影翎 Antigravity」正式发布全球首款 8K 全景无人机 Antigravity A1。

    Equipped with a 1/1.28-inch sensor, supporting 8K30fps, 5.2K60fps, and 4K100fps panoramic video recording, capable of fully capturing the surrounding environment in a single flight;

    Paired with Vision flight goggles, featuring a Pancake optical structure and dual 1-inch Micro-OLED screens, weighing 340 grams, supporting up to 150 minutes of use;

    The Grip motion controller supports intuitive "point-and-fly" control logic while retaining FPV mode;

    Supports OmniLink 360 panoramic image transmission, with a maximum transmission distance of up to 10 kilometers under FCC standards;

    Body weight 249 grams, meeting no-registration regulations in most regions, supporting intelligent obstacle avoidance and payload detection systems.

In terms of battery life, the Antigravity A1 offers two battery specifications: standard battery life of 24 minutes, and long-endurance battery life of 39 minutes. 续航方面，Antigravity A1 提供两种电池规格：标准电池续航 24 分钟，长续航电池续航 39 分钟。

In terms of price, Yingling A1 offers three packages. The panoramic flight standard package is priced starting from 7999 yuan, with a limited-time national subsidy price starting from 6799 yuan; the exploration package sells for 7999 yuan; and the long-endurance exploration package sells for 8499 yuan. 价格方面，影翎 A1 提供三种套装，其中全景飞行标准套装定价 7999 元起，限时国补价 6799 元起；探索套装售价 7999 元；长续航探索套装售价 8499 元。

All three versions include the host, Vision flight glasses, and Grip motion controller, with the main differences being battery capacity and the number of accessories. 三种版本均包含主机、Vision 飞行眼镜与 Grip 体感遥控器，区别主要在电池容量与配件数量。

item.title: 三星 Galaxy Buds 4 电池容量曝光：基础款下降 Pro 款提升
item.guid: 三星-Galaxy-Buds-4-电池容量曝光：基础款下降-Pro-款提升
item.description:
According to Android Authority, the battery design of the Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 series shows a "one up, one down" change: the battery capacity of the basic Buds 4 has been reduced compared to its predecessor, while the Buds 4 Pro has seen an increase. Specific capacities are as follows: 据 Android Authority 报道，三星 Galaxy Buds 4 系列的电池设计出现「一升一降」的变化：基础款 Buds 4 电池容量较前代有所缩减，而 Buds 4 Pro 则获得提升。具体容量如下：

    Buds 2 and Buds 2 Pro: both 61 mAh;

    Buds 3: 48 mAh; Buds 3 Pro: 53 mAh;

    Buds 4: 42 mAh; Buds 4 Pro: 57 mAh.

Compared to Buds 3, the battery capacity of the basic Buds 4 has decreased by approximately 12.5%, while the Buds 4 Pro has increased to 57 mAh, suggesting better battery life performance. 与 Buds 3 相比，Buds 4 基础款电池容量下降约 12.5%，而 Buds 4 Pro 则提升至 57 mAh，预计续航表现更佳。

A report from Galaxy Club in October indicated that the charging case's battery capacity only saw a slight increase of about 3%. Overall, the Galaxy Buds 4 series' battery life is not expected to have significant issues. Galaxy Club 在 10 月的报告指出，充电盒电池容量仅有约 3% 的小幅提升。整体来看，Galaxy Buds 4 系列的续航预计不会出现明显问题。

Regarding specific battery life performance, previous SoundGuys tests showed that both the Buds 2 and non-Pro Buds 3 could achieve approximately 5 hours of battery life. Combining existing data, the actual performance of the Buds 4 series still requires further verification. 具体续航表现方面，此前 SoundGuys 测试显示，Buds 2 与 Buds 3 非 Pro 款均可实现约 5 小时续航。结合现有数据，Buds 4 系列的实际表现仍需进一步验证。

item.title: 豆包上线 Seedream 4.5 模型，图像生成能力全面升级
item.guid: 豆包上线-Seedream-4.5-模型，图像生成能力全面升级
item.description:
Yesterday, Doubao announced a further upgrade to its image editing and generation capabilities, fully supporting the Seedream 4.5 model. This update focuses on enhancing the detail restoration and overall texture of image generation, aiming to bring creative results closer to professional-grade finished products. 昨天，豆包宣布 P 图与生图能力再度升级，全面支持 Seedream 4.5 模型。此次更新重点提升图像生成的细节还原度与整体质感，旨在让创作效果更接近成片水准。

The upgraded features show significant improvements in several aspects: 升级后的功能在多个方面展现出显著改进：

    Portrait retouching and photo refinement: The presentation of light and shadow, skin tone, and temperature is more realistic, emphasizing the preservation of memories rather than recreation;

    Layout and composition optimization: Generated images have clear layers and natural composition, reflecting the aesthetic order of professional designers;

    Multi-image complex task processing: The model can accurately identify and lock onto subjects, maintaining character consistency across different angles and scenes, ensuring story coherence and emotional consistency;

    Style extension and texture upgrade: Supports cross-image color scheme conversion and 3D style generation, making each creation more like a complete artistic expression.

Doubao stated that this upgrade not only improves the fineness of single-image generation but also demonstrates stronger stability and consistency in multi-image tasks, further expanding AI's application potential in fields such as design, poster creation, and logo production. 豆包方面表示，此次升级在提升单图生成的精细度的基础上，还在多图任务中展现出更强的稳定性与一致性，进一步拓展了 AI 在设计、海报与 Logo 制作等领域的应用潜力。

item.title: Google 推出跨平台自动化新工具，零代码打造 Gemini AI Agent
item.guid: Google-推出跨平台自动化新工具，零代码打造-Gemini-AI-Agent
item.description:
Google officially launched Workspace Studio yesterday, a new automation tool based on Gemini 3, designed to help users quickly create, manage, and share AI Agents. Google 于昨天正式推出 Workspace Studio，这是一款基于 Gemini 3 的全新自动化工具，旨在帮助用户快速创建、管理并分享 AI 智能体（AI Agents）。

Previously, the platform entered the enterprise user testing phase at Cloud Next 2025 and is now fully open to Workspace subscription plan users including Business, Enterprise, and Education. 此前，该平台在 Cloud Next 2025 进入企业用户测试阶段，如今已全面开放至 Business、Enterprise 与 Education 等 Workspace 订阅计划用户。

The core of Workspace Studio lies in "no-code" and "natural language-driven" capabilities. Workspace Studio 的核心在于「零代码」与「自然语言驱动」。

Users simply describe tasks in plain language, such as "When an email contains a question, mark it as 'To Reply' and remind me in the 'Chat' App," and the system will automatically generate the corresponding agent. 用户只需用简单的语言描述任务，例如「当邮件包含问题时标记为『待回复』并在『Chat』App 中提醒我」，系统即可自动生成对应的智能体。

These agents can not only perform email classification, content extraction, and smart notifications, but also conduct sentiment analysis and content generation, further improving office efficiency. 这些智能体不仅能完成邮件分类、内容提取、智能通知，还能进行情感分析与内容生成，进一步提升办公效率。

Unlike traditional "rule-driven" automation, Workspace Studio leverages Gemini's reasoning and contextual understanding capabilities, enabling agents to flexibly adapt to new information and execute complex workflows. 与传统的「规则驱动」自动化不同，Workspace Studio 借助 Gemini 的推理与上下文理解能力，使智能体能够灵活适应新信息，执行复杂工作流。

Its functions cover Google first-party applications such as Gmail, Chat, and Drive, and support integration with third-party tools like Asana, Jira, Mailchimp, and Salesforce, breaking down cross-platform data silos. 其功能覆盖 Gmail、Chat、Drive 等 Google 第一方应用，并支持与 Asana、Jira、Mailchimp、Salesforce 等第三方工具集成，打破了跨平台数据孤岛。

In addition, Workspace Studio supports team sharing, allowing users to copy efficient agents to team members, thereby improving collaboration efficiency. 此外，Workspace Studio 支持团队共享，用户可将高效的智能体复制至团队成员，提升协作效率。

Google states that the tool's goal is to enable every employee to design automation processes that meet their business needs within minutes, thereby lowering the programming threshold and promoting the widespread adoption of AI within enterprises. Google 表示，该工具的目标是让每位员工都能在几分钟内设计出符合自身业务需求的自动化流程，从而降低编程门槛，推动 AI 在企业内部的普及。

Currently, Workspace Studio has been gradually rolled out globally, and users who have subscribed to Google AI Pro for Education or Google AI Ultra for Business can also gain access. 目前，Workspace Studio 已在全球范围内逐步上线，订阅了 Google AI Pro for Education 或 Google AI Ultra for Business 的用户也可获得访问权限。

item.title: 灵光上线「闪游戏」：30 秒即可生成小游戏
item.guid: 灵光上线「闪游戏」：30-秒即可生成小游戏
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Group's full-modal general AI assistant "Lingguang" officially launched the "Flash Game" feature. 昨天，蚂蚁集团旗下全模态通用 AI 助手「灵光」正式上线「闪游戏」功能。

This feature differs from traditional mini-games, emphasizing that everyone can create and modify them. Even ordinary users without programming knowledge can generate a flash game in as fast as 30 seconds by describing it with a single natural language sentence in the chat box. 该功能区别于传统小游戏，强调人人可手搓、可修改，即便没有编程基础的普通用户，也能在对话框中通过一句自然语言描述，在最快 30 秒内生成一个闪游戏。

Users only need to input simple prompts, and the system can quickly generate the corresponding game. It also supports further modifications via language, such as changing character images, backgrounds, adding hit effects, and even adjusting difficulty and rules. 用户只需输入简单提示词，系统即可快速生成对应游戏，并支持通过语言继续修改角色图片、背景、增加击打特效，甚至调整难度与规则。

By optimizing AI models and interaction processes, "Flash Game" significantly lowers the creation threshold, providing users with a more convenient tool for impromptu creation. 通过优化 AI 模型与交互流程，「闪游戏」显著降低了创作门槛，为用户提供更便捷的即兴创作工具。

Since its launch on November 18, Lingguang has surpassed 2 million downloads in a short period, with a growth rate exceeding ChatGPT and Sora2. According to previous reports, as of December 2, Lingguang users had successfully created 3.3 million flash applications, with entertainment and lifestyle tools accounting for the highest proportion. 灵光于 11 月 18 日上线以来，短时间内下载量突破 200 万，增速超过 ChatGPT 与 Sora2。据此前报道，截至 12 月 2 日，灵光用户已成功创建 330 万个闪应用，其中娱乐与生活工具类占比最高。

item.title: 塔斯汀陷入「大开大关」困境：90 天关店近千家
item.guid: 塔斯汀陷入「大开大关」困境：90-天关店近千家
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Tastien Burger is facing the dilemma of "large-scale openings and closures" after rapidly expanding to a scale of ten thousand stores. 据界面新闻报道，塔斯汀汉堡在快速扩张至万店规模后，正陷入门店「大开大关」的困境。

Data from Jihai Brand Monitoring shows that as of December 2, Tastien opened 968 new stores and closed 907 stores in the past 90 days, with approximately 10,296 stores currently in operation. 极海品牌监测数据显示，截至 12 月 2 日，过去 90 天内塔斯汀新开 968 家店，同时关闭 907 家，目前在营门店约为 10296 家。

In contrast, the proportion of store closures for Wallace and KFC during the same period was significantly lower than Tastien, highlighting its insufficient expansion stability. 相比之下，华莱士和肯德基在同期的关店比例明显低于塔斯汀，这凸显其扩张稳定性不足。

Tastien was founded in 2012 and rapidly expanded in the lower-tier markets with its "Chinese Burger" positioning and cost-effectiveness, becoming a "ten-thousand-store brand" in the second half of this year. 塔斯汀成立于 2012 年，凭借「中国汉堡」定位和性价比优势在下沉市场迅速扩张，并于今年下半年成为「万店品牌」。

Data shows that between 2022 and 2025, Tastien opened over 2300 new stores each year, with 3420 stores opened in 2023 alone, exceeding the expansion speed of Wallace and KFC. 数据显示，2022 至 2025 年间，塔斯汀每年新开店数量均超过 2300 家，2023 年更是达到 3420 家，扩张速度超过华莱士和肯德基。

However, overly dense store openings have led to declining performance in some outlets, and franchisees are generally facing profit pressure. 然而，过度密集的开店导致部分门店业绩下滑，加盟商普遍面临盈利压力。

Industry insiders point out that consumers in first-tier cities have a higher acceptance of KFC and McDonald's, and coupled with the competition from discounted meal sets, Tastien's price advantage has been weakened. 业内人士指出，一线城市消费者对肯德基和麦当劳的接受度更高，加之优惠套餐的竞争，使塔斯汀的价格优势被削弱。

Some franchisees indicate that the current payback period for a single store has extended to about 2 years, with an average gross profit margin of around 45%, which is lower than the tea beverage industry. 部分加盟商表示，当前单店回本周期已延长至约 2 年，平均毛利率在 45% 左右，低于茶饮行业。

Analysts believe that Tastien's large-scale store closures might be the brand actively eliminating low-quality franchisees to optimize its overall network. However, the high proportion of closures also reflects its shortcomings in franchisee selection, management, and market positioning. 分析人士认为，塔斯汀大规模关店可能是品牌方主动淘汰低质加盟商，以优化整体网络。但高比例的关店也反映出其在加盟商甄选、管理和市场定位上的不足。

Despite this, Tastien is still actively recruiting franchisees through official channels, listing Beijing, Shanghai, Shandong, Jiangsu, and other areas as key expansion regions. The outside world is generally concerned about whether it will use the capital market to tell a new growth story in the future, especially after the equity changes in June this year, with market speculation that it may be preparing for an IPO. 尽管如此，塔斯汀仍在官方渠道积极招募加盟商，并将北京、上海、山东、江苏等地列为重点拓展区域。外界普遍关注其未来是否会借资本市场讲述新的增长故事，尤其是在今年 6 月股权变动后，市场猜测其或为上市做准备。

item.title: 361° 接入淘宝闪购，全国 1500 家门店实现 30 分钟送达
item.guid: 361°-接入淘宝闪购，全国-1500-家门店实现-30-分钟送达
item.description:
According to Ziniu News, sports brand 361° officially integrated with Taobao Flash Sale service yesterday. 据紫牛新闻报道，运动品牌 361° 于昨天正式接入淘宝闪购服务。

The first batch of services has been launched in Chongqing and will gradually cover 160 cities including Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, and Jinan, with a total of 1,500 stores going online. Consumers can search for '361' on Taobao Flash Sale to select nearby stores, place orders, and enjoy 30-minute express delivery service for sports equipment. 首批业务率先落地重庆，并将在北京、上海、广州、济南等 160 个城市逐步覆盖，共计 1500 家门店上线。消费者在淘宝闪购搜索「361」即可选择附近门店下单，享受运动装备 30 分钟极速送达服务。

The products integrated this time cover multiple categories, including the annual flagship running shoe Feiran 4.5, the water-repellent 'Rain Screen Series' running shoes designed for autumn and winter rainy weather, as well as basic apparel, accessories, and children's products. 此次接入的商品涵盖多品类，包括年度重磅跑鞋单品飞燃 4.5、应对秋冬雨水天气的防泼水「雨屏系列」跑鞋，以及基础款鞋服、配件和儿童产品。

The New Retail Director of 361° stated that Taobao's massive e-commerce traffic and instant retail model are expected to bring significant retail growth, while also posing higher demands on the brand's supply chain and operational capabilities. 361° 品牌新零售总监表示，淘宝庞大的电商流量与即时零售模式有望带来显著的零售增量，同时也对品牌供应链和运营能力提出更高要求。

Alibaba's Q3 financial report shows that as of October 31, approximately 3,500 Tmall brands have integrated their offline stores into Taobao Flash Sale. 阿里巴巴 9 月季度财报显示，截至 10 月 31 日，约 3500 个天猫品牌已将线下门店接入淘宝闪购。

Under the synergistic effect, during Tmall Double 11, Taobao App consumers achieved double-digit year-on-year growth, and Tmall brand's instant retail daily average orders increased by 198% month-on-month compared to September. 在协同效应下，天猫双 11 期间，淘宝 App 消费者同比实现双位数增长，天猫品牌即时零售日均订单环比 9 月增长 198%。

item.title: 阿里巴巴首个人才公寓落地南京，聚焦青年人才「乐业安居」
item.guid: 阿里巴巴首个人才公寓落地南京，聚焦青年人才「乐业安居」
item.description:
According to 'Jianye Broadcast' report, Alibaba's first talent apartment, 'Qin Cheng Yu,' officially commenced operations yesterday in Jianye District, Nanjing. The project is located in Building T7 of Nanjing Alibaba Center, boasting a prime location above two subway lines, adjacent to Yongchu Road Station on Metro Line 7 and S3 Line, and is within walking distance. 据「建邺播报」报道，阿里巴巴首家人才公寓「亲橙寓」已于昨天在南京建邺区正式投入运营。项目位于南京阿里中心 T7 栋，坐拥双地铁上盖区位，紧邻地铁 7 号线与 S3 号线永初路站，步行即可抵达。

Qin Cheng Yu offers a total of 565 guest rooms, ranging from 38 to 95 square meters, with five different layouts available. The interiors are equipped with smart home appliances and scientific storage systems, feature quadruple sound insulation design, and support move-in with just a bag. During its opening period, the apartment will offer preferential rental policies to young talents in Nanjing. 亲橙寓共设 565 间客房，面积覆盖 38 — 95 平方米，提供五种户型选择。室内配备全屋智能家电与科学收纳系统，并采用四重隔音设计，支持拎包入住。开业期间，公寓将面向南京青年人才推出租金优惠政策。

In addition to its residential function, Qin Cheng Yu also features approximately 1,600 square meters of public space, including a reading room, gym, multi-functional activity rooms, and is connected to a rooftop park. 除居住功能外，亲橙寓还打造约 1600 平方米的公共空间，包括书屋、健身房、多功能活动室等，并与屋顶公园相连。

In the future, this space will regularly host activities such as reading salons and skill courses, based on the 'Qin Cheng Activity Calendar,' forming a multi-functional growth community that offers 'more than just living.' 未来，该空间将依托「亲橙活动日历」定期举办读书沙龙、技能课程等活动，形成「不止于住」的复合型成长社区。

In recent years, Jianye District has been driven by a 'Finance + AI' dual-engine strategy, attracting high-level headquarters projects such as Alibaba, Xiaomi, JD.com, and Hundsun Technologies, leading to the clustering of over 80 ecosystem enterprises and forming an industrial pattern of 'leading enterprises + ecological synergy.' 近年来，建邺区以「金融+AI」双轮驱动，吸引阿里巴巴、小米、京东、恒生电子等高能级总部项目入驻，带动超 80 家生态链企业集聚，形成「大厂引领+生态协同」的产业格局。

Qin Cheng Yu achieves seamless connectivity with office spaces, the commercial complex 'Jinling Tiandi,' Future Kitchen, and UFO Plaza through the 1-kilometer-long 'Ali Corridor,' creating an efficient '5-minute work-life circle.' 亲橙寓通过总长 1 公里的「阿里廊」实现与办公空间、商业综合体「金陵天地」、未来厨房及飞碟广场的无缝连接，构建高效的「5 分钟职住生活圈」。

item.title: 《猎杀游戏》今日登陆院线
item.guid: 《猎杀游戏》今日登陆院线
item.description:
The film 'The Running Man,' adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name, released its 'Onboard Terror' trailer yesterday. Directed by Edgar Wright, the film officially premieres today and has a total runtime of 133 minutes. 改编自史蒂芬·金同名小说的电影《猎杀游戏》昨日发布「机上惊魂」预告。影片由埃德加 · 赖特执导，今天正式上映，全长 133 分钟。

The trailer opens with a private jet taking off, and the tension inside the cabin quickly escalates as protagonist Ben Richards is ambushed, a coffee pot is instantly shattered, leading to a fierce attack by the crew. 预告片以私人飞机腾空的场景开场，机舱内的紧张氛围迅速升级，男主角本 · 理查兹遭遇突袭，咖啡壶瞬间被击碎，随即引发机组人员的猛烈攻击。

The film tells the story of a TV reality show called 'The Running Man,' where contestants must survive for 30 days while being hunted by professional killers. The process is broadcast live, and participants receive higher bonuses for each additional day they survive. 影片讲述一档名为「猎杀游戏」的电视真人秀，参赛者必须在职业杀手的追猎下存活 30 天，过程全程直播，每多活一天即可获得更高额奖金。

The protagonist Richards is played by Glen Powell, a 35-year-old unemployed worker who, to save his critically ill daughter, accepts an invitation from show producer Dan Killian (played by Josh Brolin) and enters this bloody survival competition. 男主角理查兹由格伦·鲍威尔饰演，他是一名 35 岁的失业工人，为了救治病重的女儿接受节目制作人丹·基利安（乔什·布洛林 饰）的邀约，踏入这场血腥的生存竞赛。

item.title: 《阿凡达：火与烬》中文配音阵容官宣，定档 12 月 19 日
item.guid: 《阿凡达：火与烬》中文配音阵容官宣，定档-12-月-19-日
item.description:
The Chinese voice cast for 'Avatar: Fire and Ash' was officially announced yesterday, and it has been confirmed that the film will be released simultaneously with North America in mainland Chinese cinemas on December 19, 2025. 《阿凡达：火与烬》（Avatar: Fire and Ash）已于昨天正式公布中文配音阵容，并确认将于 2025 年 12 月 19 日同步北美登陆中国内地院线。

The film continues with the original cast from 'Avatar: The Way of Water,' with four top actors from the Chinese film industry once again joining forces to lend their voices to Pandora. 影片延续《阿凡达：水之道》的原班阵容，四位华语影坛顶尖演员再度携手为潘多拉星球注入声音力量。

Deng Chao and Sun Li will once again team up to voice Jake Sully and Neytiri, portraying the emotional trials and family responsibilities of this soulmate couple after suffering the loss of loved ones. 邓超与孙俪将再次联袂为杰克 · 萨利与奈蒂莉配音，演绎这对灵魂伴侣在痛失至亲后的情感磨砺与家族责任。

Huang Xuan will continue to voice Tonowari, leader of the Metkayina clan, with his deep and mellow voice highlighting the character's composure and leadership aura. Meanwhile, Zhang Ziyi once again takes on the Chinese voiceover for Ronal, the female leader of the Metkayina tribe. 黄轩将继续为岛礁族首领特诺瓦里配音，其低沉醇厚的声线凸显角色的沉稳与领袖气场。与此同时，章子怡再度担纲梅卡伊纳部落女性首领罗娜尔的中文配音。

item.title: 《用武之地》预告曝光
item.guid: 《用武之地》预告曝光
item.description:
The latest trailer for the film "The Place of Use," produced by Ning Hao and directed by Shen Ao, was released yesterday, revealing for the first time on the big screen the dark secrets of the overseas hostage industry chain. The film will be released on December 31st. 宁浩监制、申奥执导的电影《用武之地》昨日发布最新预告，首次在大银幕揭示境外人质产业链的黑暗内幕。影片将于 12 月 31 日上映。

The film directly confronts the horrific atrocities in overseas war zones, including thugs abusing slave laborers, training child soldiers, secretly planting informants, and human trafficking. Hostages are openly priced at "5 million US dollars," and if overdue, they are executed. 影片直击境外战乱地带的恐怖暴行，包括暴徒虐打奴工、培养童兵、暗布眼线以及人命交易。人质被明码标价「500 万美金」，逾期即遭撕票。

Overseas reporter Ma Xiao (played by Xiao Yang) and volunteer doctor Pan Wenjia (played by Qi Xi), a married couple, are kidnapped, and the perpetrators demand a huge ransom. As couples are often only allowed to "kill one and keep one," the two are forced to save themselves and escape. 驻外记者马笑（肖央 饰）与志愿医生潘文佳（齐溪 饰）夫妇遭遇绑架，暴徒要求巨额赎金。由于夫妻往往只能「杀一个留一个」，两人不得不自救逃生。

The film is based on the true experiences of overseas hostage survivors. Director Shen Ao emphasizes "the perspective of ordinary people" and "drawing from reality," extracting details from documentaries and hostage memoirs. The crew traveled overseas for filming, and the entire film was shot with IMAX special cameras. 影片取材自境外幸存人质真实经历，导演申奥强调「普通人视角」与「取材真实」，并从纪录片与人质回忆录中提炼细节。剧组远赴海外取景，全片采用 IMAX 特制拍摄。
